extension.summary: FFmpeg binary for transcoding and audio/video manipulating.
extension.news:
110 - Update gnutls to 3.6.13
109 - Update AV1 to 2019-11-15 - Update FFmpeg to 4.2.1 - Update VPX to 1.8.1 - Update x265 to 3.2
108 - Update FFmpeg to 4.1.4 - Update libopus to 1.3.1 - Update gnutls to 3.6.10
107 - Update AV1 to 2019-03-05 - Update FFmpeg to 4.1.3 - Update x264 to 2019-03-06 - Update x265 to 3.0
106 - Use system libidn2
105 - Removed FDK-AAC - Build with GNUTLS - Update AV1 to 2019-01-09
104 - Update AV1 to d2a592e - Update FFmpeg to 4.1 - Update opus to 1.3 - Update x264 to 2018-11-16 - Update x265 to 2.9
103 - Update AV1 to 2018-10-02 - Update FFmpeg to 4.0.2 - Update X264 to 2018-10-01
102 - Rename binary to ffmpeg (no ffmpegx anymore) - Update AV1 to 96ee0eb - Update FFmpeg to 4.0.1 - Update X264 to 2018-06-27 - Update X265 to 2.8
101 - Update to FFmpeg 4.0 - Added AV1 codec
100 - Initial release
